WorkItem.ClosedComment: No one ever gave us this
WorkItem.Description: I have always had the problem, that the Items that drop from Chests (Like Hodirs) do show as "other" in the filters. Today I tried around a bit, and found out, that if I put in the german name for the "Cache of Winter" the Filter works as it is supposed to. Seems to me, we should either use translation also in the filters, or the filters should use the untranslated names.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.ItemFilters] Translated ItemFilters cache for Foreign Languages

Comments.Message: Give us the translations and we'll look into using them

here the translations:

Flame Leviathan = Flammenleviathan
Ignis = Ignis, Meister des Eisenwerks

Steelbreaker = Stahlbrecher
Runemaster Molgeim = Runenmeister Molgeim
Stormcaller Brundir = Sturmrufer Brundir

Freya's Gift = Freyas Geschenk 
Cache of Winter = Schrein des Winters 
Cache of Innovation = Schrein der Innovation

I will do the Crusaders Colliseum later...
